member.name: SYNCMGR_CONTROL_FLAGS
member.summary: Specifies how an operation requested on certain methods of should be performed.

member.name: SYNCMGR_CONTROL_FLAGS.SYNCMGR_CF_NONE
member.summary: Perform the operation not using any of the other flags in this enumeration.

member.name: SYNCMGR_CONTROL_FLAGS.SYNCMGR_CF_NOUI
member.summary: Perform the operation without asking the sync handler to display the UI during the operation.

member.name: SYNCMGR_CONTROL_FLAGS.SYNCMGR_CF_VALID
member.summary: A mask used to determine valid flags.
